p:
In 2013, expert consultation, site visits, and interviews with local people and stakeholders identified seven study sites. An effort was made in the site selection process to include a diverse set of livelihood systems that were experiencing extreme environmental adversity. The objective was to include the three principal stress clusters affecting the country:
Cyclones on the coast.
River bank erosion in flood plains.
Drought in water-stressed areas in North-Western Bangladesh.
